trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Meadville
There were no other sightings in Meadville on or around June 13th 2012
Summary: wingless bright white body with black stripe around middle
divs: Sighting Detailsmyself and another person were watching some planes with binoculars and noticed a pill shaped object with no wings flying about the same speed as the jets but about half as high.we watched as the object was flying south and veered to southwest and continued out of sight.i watched closely as it veered to try to see any wings and still didn't see any.it happened june 13 2012 at 7:15 pm on a clear day with little to no clouds.
